<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This file implements the instruction pattern combiner classes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Currently, it handles pattern expressions for:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  &#42; Truncate instruction</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#ifndef LLVM&#95;LIB&#95;TRANSFORMS&#95;AGGRESSIVEINSTCOMBINE&#95;COMBINEINTERNAL&#95;H</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#define LLVM&#95;LIB&#95;TRANSFORMS&#95;AGGRESSIVEINSTCOMBINE&#95;COMBINEINTERNAL&#95;H</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/smallvector-h">llvm/ADT/SmallVector.h</a>&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/knownbits-h">llvm/Support/KnownBits.h</a>&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TruncInstCombine - looks for expression graphs dominated by trunc</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instructions and for each eligible graph, it will create a reduced bit-width</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// expression and replace the old expression with this new one and remove the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// old one. Eligible expression graph is such that:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   1 Contains only supported instructions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   2 Supported leaves: ZExtInst, SExtInst, TruncInst and Constant value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   3 Can be evaluated into type with reduced legal bit-width (or Trunc type).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   4 All instructions in the graph must not have users outside the graph.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      Only exception is for &#123;ZExt, SExt&#125;Inst with operand type equal to the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      new reduced type chosen in (3).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The motivation for this optimization is that evaluating and expression using</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// smaller bit-width is preferable, especially for vectorization where we can</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// fit more values in one vectorized instruction. In addition, this optimization</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// may decrease the number of cast instructions, but will not increase it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">namespace </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm">llvm</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncache">AssumptionCache</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/truncinst">TruncInst</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Minimum number of LSBs needed to generate the ValidBitWidth.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// The reduced value generated to replace the old instruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// An ordered map representing expression graph post-dominated by current</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// processed TruncInst. It maps each instruction in the graph to its Info</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// structure. The map is ordered such that each instruction appears before</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Given a \\p V value and a \\p SclTy scalar type return the generated reduced</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// value of \\p V based on the type \\p SclTy.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param V value to be reduced.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param SclTy scalar version of new type to reduce to.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\return the new reduced value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Create a new expression graph using the reduced /p SclTy type and replace</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the old expression graph with it. Also erase all instructions in the old</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// graph, except those that are still needed outside the graph.</Highlight></CodeLine>
